pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download Data from Brazil's Population Census // Download data from Brazil's population census. The package is built on top of the 'Arrow' platform https://arrow.apache.org/docs/r/, which allows users to work with larger-than-memory census data using 'dplyr' familiar functions. https://arrow.apache.org/docs/r/articles/arrow.html#analyzing- arrow-data-with-dplyr.
